Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.name: finalLayoutAttributesForDisappearingItem(at:)

Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.name: initialLayoutAttributesForAppearingSupplementaryElement(ofKind:at:)

Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.name: finalLayoutAttributesForDisappearingSupplementaryElement(ofKind:at:)
Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.abstract: Retrieves the final layout information for a supplementary view that is about to be removed from the collection view.
